hotels.title: Designer Hong Kong Luxury Suites
hotels.description: Embrace the sky-high hedonism of Hong Kong with a stay at The Jervois, a luxury all-suite hotel designed by renowned French designer, Christian Liaigre. Found in the heart of the hip Sheung Wan district, the clean-lined and contemporary lodging is a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle below but perfectly positioned to explore the trendy designer hubs, art galleries, lively restaurants, pubs, bars and historic landmarks Hong Kong is known for. The all-suite hotel is all about private indulgence, with elegant detailing, clean lines, neutral tones and sensational views of the city. Marble bathrooms elevate the simple bathing experience from functional to fantastic, while the separate living spaces include a modern kitchenette and living and dining areas. Suites are designed to entertain and accommodate all day long, but should you want to soak up some sunshine, a rooftop terrace is perfectly placed for views over Victoria Harbour.
